# pdfgrep 
a commandline utility to search text in PDF files (inspired by the original pdfgrep.org)

## installation

``` bash
  $ [sudo] npm install pdfgrep -g
```

Do a quick test

``` bash
  $ pdfgrep --file <FILE_NAME>
```

## Usage


``` bash
    $ pdfgrep [OPTION…] PATTERN [FILE…]
    $ pdfgrep [OPTION…] [-e PATTERN | -f FILE] [FILE…]
```
